long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
web ext plugin for ohmycheatsheet, pin cheatsheet from stackoverflow etc... much easier. 

适用于 ohmycheatsheet 的浏览器插件，帮助开发者在类似 stackoverflow 网站更好的创建 cheatsheet 

# 0.1.4

- 修复浮动编辑器异常退出
- fix early reject portal editor

# ~0.1.3

- fix bugs

# 0.1.1

- 修复 rmd 会影响所有页面元素
- fix rmd will affect all pre & code element content

# 0.1.0

- 允许在创建之前编辑
- 展示最近创建的 cheatsheet
- support edit cheatsheet content before create
- list recent cheatsheet

# 0.0.3

- change github auth app

# 0.0.2

- support github oauth flow
